name: webcmd
title: WebCMD
description:
WebCMD is a website hosted on a custom-made server which gives you access to your computer's command prompt remotely and safely through a login system. It has many useful development features such as automatically detecting file updates, automatic serving of static files and provides an easy interface to create API routes.
{attach:main}
